verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%>, go up <S%H5927><s%> to Bethel <S%H1008><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> there: and make <S%H6213><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, that appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto thee when thou fleddest <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>.

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his household <S%H1004><s%>, and to all that were with him, Put away <S%H5493><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> that are among you <S%H8432><s%>, and be clean <S%H2891><s%>, and change <S%H2498><s%> your garments <S%H8071><s%>:

And let us arise <S%H6965><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> to Bethel <S%H1008><s%>; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, who answered <S%H6030><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress <S%H6869><s%>, and was with me in the way <S%H1870><s%> which I went <S%H1980><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> all the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which were in their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all their earrings <S%H5141><s%> which were in their ears <S%H241><s%>; and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> them under the oak <S%H424><s%> which was by Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>: and the terror <S%H2847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was upon the cities <S%H5892><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them, and they did not pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Luz <S%H3870><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, that is, Bethel <S%H1008><s%>, he and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> Elbethel <S%H416><s%>: because there God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H1540><s%> unto him, when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%>. Elbethel: that is, The God of Bethel

But Deborah <S%H1683><s%> Rebekah's <S%H7259><s%> nurse <S%H3243><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and she was buried <S%H6912><s%> beneath Bethel <S%H1008><s%> under an oak <S%H437><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Allonbachuth <S%H439><s%>. Allonbachuth: that is, The oak of weeping
And God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again, when he came <S%H935><s%> out of Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Thy name <S%H8034><s%> is Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: thy name <S%H8034><s%> shall not be called <S%H7121><s%> any more Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, but Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be thy name <S%H8034><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, I am God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%>: be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> and a company <S%H6951><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be of thee, and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of thy loins <S%H2504><s%>;

And the land <S%H776><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, to thee I will give it <S%H5414><s%>, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from him in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set up <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him, even a pillar <S%H4678><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>: and he poured <S%H5258><s%> a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thereon, and he poured <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> thereon.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> where God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> with him, Bethel <S%H1008><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Bethel <S%H1008><s%>; and there was but <S%H5750><s%> a little <S%H3530><s%> way <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%>: and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> travailed <S%H3205><s%>, and she had hard <S%H7185><s%> labour <S%H3205><s%>. a little: Heb. a little piece of ground

And it came to pass, when she was in hard <S%H7185><s%> labour <S%H3205><s%>, that the midwife <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not; thou shalt have this son <S%H1121><s%> also.

And it came to pass, as her soul <S%H5315><s%> was in departing <S%H3318><s%>, (for she died <S%H4191><s%>) that she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Benoni <S%H1126><s%>: but his father <S%H1><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> him Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>. Benoni: that is, The son of my sorrow Benjamin: that is, The son of the right hand
And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%>, which is Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> upon her grave <S%H6900><s%>: that is the pillar <S%H4678><s%> of Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> grave <S%H6900><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%>, and spread <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> beyond <S%H1973><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Edar <S%H4029><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>, that Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> concubine <S%H6370><s%>: and Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it. Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>:

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah <S%H3812><s%>; Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>:
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>:
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> handmaid <S%H8198><s%>; Dan <S%H1835><s%>, and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>:

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%>, Leah's <S%H3812><s%> handmaid <S%H8198><s%>; Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Asher <S%H836><s%>: these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> unto Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, unto the city of Arbah <S%H7153><s%>, which is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, where Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%>.
And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>, being old <S%H2205><s%> and full <S%H7649><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>: and his sons <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> him.
